memberdef.name: lv_draw_rect_main_mid

detaileddescription.para:
Draw the middle part (rectangular) of a rectangle
coords
the coordinates of the original rectangle
mask
the rectangle will be drawn only on this area
rects_p
pointer to a rectangle style
opa_scale
scale down all opacities by the factor

detaileddescription.para:
Approximate the opacity for anti-aliasing. Used the first segment of a circle which is the longest and have the most non-linearity (cos)
seg
length of the line segment
px_id
index of pixel on the line segment
line_opa
opacity of the lien (it will be the max opacity)
the desired opacity of the pixel
